code: import Card from'../UI/Card';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{addToCart as _addToCart,loadCurrentItem as _loadCurrentItem}from"../../Redux/shopping/shopping-actions";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductItem=function ProductItem(_ref){var product=_ref.product,addToCart=_ref.addToCart,loadCurrentItem=_ref.loadCurrentItem;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row row-cols-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col display-img",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,className:"small-prod-img",alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cartbtn add_to_cart",onClick:function onClick(){return addToCart(product.id);},children:"Add to Cart"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col product-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"prod-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rating",children:product.rating}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"prod-price",children:["Rs ",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"product/".concat(product.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"view-details-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return loadCurrentItem(product);},children:"View Details"})})})]})]})})});};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addToCart:function addToCart(id){return dispatch(_addToCart(id));},loadCurrentItem:function loadCurrentItem(item){return dispatch(_loadCurrentItem(item));}};};export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(ProductItem);
